data.event: It was first settled in 1738 as part of Peterborough Slip, an area which until 1768 included Temple.
It was first settled in 1738 as part of Peterborough Slip, an area which until 1768 included Temple.
In 1777, it petitioned to become part of Peterborough, but was denied.
It was called Sliptown until 1791, when it was incorporated as Sharon.
